title: Sakura Capusule
synopsis: On a small hill in a neighbourhood in the outskirts of Tokyo, there was a little park. There were six close girls who always used to play there together since they were small.
characters: ['Yuuka, Shiroishi', 'Nagisa, Takada', 'Akari, Oosumi', 'Kotone, Oosu', 'Iku, Amakumo', 'Mahiru, Aki']
